basics.name: Adrian Martínez
basics.label: Computer Science Engineer with over 2 years of experience in Full Stack development.
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating scalable and efficient web solutions. I specialize in developing modern applications using technologies like Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript. With experience in agile methodologies and development best practices, I stand out for my continuous learning ability and commitment to technical excellence. I constantly seek new challenges that allow me to grow professionally while delivering value through innovative solutions.

work.name: Universidad de las Ciencias Informáticas
work.summary: Development and implementation of a critical event management system for the supply chain. Led the architecture design and implementation of key functionalities using Python.

work.summary: Development of technological solutions using Python in a professional environment.

projects.name: nodetsep
projects.description: A CLI to quickly initialize Node.js projects with TypeScript, ts-node-dev, ESLint, and Prettier preconfigured.

projects.name: Extraordinary Events Management Module
projects.description: Comprehensive system for detecting, tracking, and resolving critical events in the supply chain. Implemented with a modular and scalable architecture.
